targets.expr:
((
  sum(rate(linera_value_cache_hit[1m])) by (key_type, value_type) or vector(0)
)
/
(
  sum(rate(linera_value_cache_hit[1m])) by (key_type, value_type) or vector(0)
  +
  sum(rate(linera_value_cache_miss[1m])) by (key_type, value_type) or vector(0)
)) * 100
